context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.
context_0.prompt: One thing that Heinz should do is to
generation: seek assistance from nonprofits or institutions that help with medical costs
contact the pharmaceutical company that produces the medication directly
seek out resources and options like fundraising programs, charities, or non-profit organizations that assist with medical costs
explore various financial options, such as fundraising platforms, charities, or non-profit organizations that help patients obtain necessary medication

explore all options, such as speaking with the doctor to see if there are any alternative or generic medications, seeking patient assistance programs that help with the cost of medications, or setting up a crowdfunding campaign to solicit donations from friends, relatives, and the general public
seek out assistance from local and government resources
explore different methods of financing the required medication
contact the pharmaceutical company that manufactures the medication directly
explore financial assistance programs, charities, or non-profit organizations that can help with the cost of the medication
look for community resources that might be able to help

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a roadside assistance service or a taxi/ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to get him to the airport on time
call for roadside assistance or a taxi immediately to ensure he reaches the airport on time
call for a taxi, Uber, or other ride sharing service, while simultaneously reaching out to a roadside assistance service to take care of his broken car
contact a taxi or ride-share service like Uber or Lyft to pick him up and take him to the airport
call for a taxi, uber, or any other form of immediate transportation service
call for roadside assistance or a tow truck to either fix his car or take him to the airport
call a taxi or an Uber, informing them about his urgent situation
call for a cab, Uber, or other ride share service to pick him up and take him to the airport
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other type of ride service to take him to the airport
call for a tow truck service or a roadside assistance and book a taxi or use a ride-share service like Uber or Lyft to continue his journey to the airport

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery to report the missing money and explain the situation
double check all the receipts and sales records for the day
first check if there's a mistake in his calculations or if the money was misplaced somewhere
immediately inform his supervisor or the business owner about the discrepancy in the cash register
check the sales receipts and surveillance video if available to try and identify any errors or discrepancies
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery to report the missing money
inform his supervisor or the owner of the bakery about the missing money and explain the situation
contact his supervisor or the owner of the bakery to report the discrepancy
carefully recount the money in the register to ensure no mistakes were made during the first count
immediately report the missing money to his superior or the owner of the bakery

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay in one location and try to create a signal for the rescue team
stay put, create a shelter, ration out whatever food and water they have left and try to keep everyone warm
stay put and avoid wandering away from their current location
stay put and create a noticeable signal
start rationing the remaining food and water among the group to last until they are found
create a noticeable signal to attract the attention of potential rescuers
stay put and create a visible signal for rescuers
stay put and create a visible signal for potential rescuers
stay put in one location
stay put, making sure their location is as visible as possible by creating a signal with bright clothing, a fire, or any available material
